cab.content: WESTERN FRONT,1, British Front.There is no change in the general situation,2 * French Front *The French continue to make progress between tho OISEand the SERRE, and are reported to bo 1 kilometre West ofGUISE. From there the lino is reported to run approximatelyalong tho road from GUISE to LA HERDS - South of MONOHEAU ieKEUFc It is not yet confirmed that MONCHEAtJ LE NEUF has beentaken.BALKAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS.There is nothing to report-ITALIAN FRONT .British and Italian troops attacked across tho PIAVE inthe area of the Island of GRAVE DI PAPADOPOLI this morning.After meeting with strong resistance, the enemy were overcomeand the troopo are advancing.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I.27th Octoberj 1918 oIssued at 18.30BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 27th OCTOBER, 1918.
